overview: This brand new series focuses on the contrast between black, red, and white - redheads who cant get enough of BBC. Cover model and celebrity performer Maitland Ward is a no-nonsense real-estate agent who is completely shameless on blurring the lines of professionalism. Also featuring remarkable performances by Bree Daniels, Ella Hughes, and Lacy Lennon in exclusive, red hot scenes.
title: Black & Red
